org.apache.pig.data

Class DataReaderWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.data.DataReaderWriter

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class DataReaderWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class was used to handle reading and writing of intermediate results of data types. Now that functionality is in BinInterSedes This class could also be used for storing permanent results, it used by BinStorage through DefaultTuple class.
